hero.subtitleDefault: BI Student Organisation unites students across campuses. Explore the opportunities and find your way into the community.
hero.titleDefault: A strong student voice across all BI campuses
hero.mission: We help students connect, grow and influence across every BI campus.

identity.title: Built by students for students
identity.description: BISO is Norway's largest student union. From parties to politics, we're the backbone of student life at BI.

mission.title: Driven by impact
mission.description: We champion student rights and make sure your voice is heard in every decision.

members.title: 12,000+ members

impact.description: Four campuses, one organisation. We share knowledge, resources and good vibes across Norway.
